question: Show documentaries and mini-series that have 7 episodes.
sql_query1:
SELECT TvShow.title 
FROM TvShow
WHERE (TvShow.tv = "Documentary Series" OR TvShow.tv = "Mini-Series") AND TvShow.number_of_episodes = 7
sql_query2:
SELECT TvShow.title 
FROM TvShow
WHERE TvShow.tv = "Documentary Series" OR TvShow.tv = "Mini-Series" AND TvShow.number_of_episodes = 7
interpretation1: What documentaries have 7 episodes and what mini-series has the same number of episodes?
interpretation2: List all documentaries and also list mini-series that have 7 episodes.
